title.value: Повышение качества уборки картофеля совершенствованием сепарирующего элеватора комбайна
Improving of the quality of potato harvesting with the help of the development of separating elevator of a potato harvester
Improving of the quality of potato harvesting with the help of the development of separating elevator of a potato harvester

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Klavsut, P.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The problems of the improvement of the quality of potato harvesting with the help of separating elevator harvester, effective operation of which depends on the intensity of the separation of the soil and degree of preservation of the tubers have been examined in the article. The application of cam shaker can significantly improve the quality of the separation of the soil, as in the main elevator, and in the processor as a whole: the purity of potato increases up to 1.1-1.6 times and the damage of tubers reduce to 1.2-1.5 times.
